thread.title: Inform Alhassan Wakaso helps ten man Rio Ave to a 2-2 draw game against Estoril
thread.title_full: Inform Alhassan Wakaso helps ten man Rio Ave to a 2-2 draw game against Estoril

title: Inform Alhassan Wakaso helps ten man Rio Ave to a 2-2 draw game against Estoril
text:
09:55 CET Inform Alhassan Wakaso helps ten man Rio Ave to a 2-2 draw game against Estoril - www.ghanasoccernet.com Ghanaian youngster Alhassan Wakaso 
Inform Ghanaian midfielder Alhassan Wakaso was in action for high flying Rio Ave as his side played out a 2-2 draw game against Estoril in the Portuguese super league. 
Alhassan who is seen as a rising star in European football has been one of the most consistent performers in the Portuguese league this season and was almost everywhere on the pitch against Estoril on Saturday night. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com Sports News Follow Us Find what you are supposed to do and serve it to others then you will become great. By: Myles Munroe
